items.content_html: Contains a simple nodejs application that converts HTML to JSON with its hierarchical structure (jsongen.js) and a simple client application that parses JSON back into HTML (htmlgen.js), returning a parent HTML element with all the content. It's for use in my lightweight SPA lib that I'm currently developing, but I have no plans to make it public.
items.title: jorgeoliveirasantos/HTMLJSON: Contains a simple nodejs application that converts HTML to JSON with its hierarchical structure (jsongen.js) and a simple client application that parses JSON back into HTML (htmlgen.js), returning a parent HTML element with all the content. It's for use in my lightweight SPA lib that I'm currently developing, but I have no plans to make it public.
